title: Ticket #6760: Add support for job parameters in BOINC
description:
Two users have requested almost the same enhancement to our BOINC code. Please review and incorporate if appropriate.

I put the changes on V8_7-boinc-pr19 and V8_7-boinc-pr22

https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/pull/19

https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/pull/22
remarks:
2018-Oct-01 13:54:46 by jfrey:
These pull requests look good. The updated boinc external (7.12.1 ) includes the corresponding gahp changes. I will merge Pull Request 19, as the author is covered under CERN's contributor license.
